thread.title: Florida getaway specials shine throughout summer
thread.title_full: Florida getaway specials shine throughout summer

author: Georgina Cruz, Special Correspondent
title: Florida getaway specials shine throughout summer
text:
Florida getaway specials shine throughout summer By Georgina Cruz, Special Correspondent Travel Florida getaway specials shine throughout summer 
Planning a Florida summer vacation this year? There are abundant specials awaiting you in the Sunshine State. Here are some to consider: 0 
· The Brazilian Court Hotel, Palm Beach –The iconic Brazilian Court Hotel invites Florida residents to indulge in the beauty of Palm Beach while enjoying an island vacation close to home. Beginning May 1 through Sept. 30, Florida residents will receive a special rate of 15 percent off, starting at $179 per night and including complimentary valet parking. Visit www.thebraziliancourt.com . 
· The Viceroy Miami, downtown Miami – This 148-room hotel is featuring a “Some Like It Hot” campaign that kicks off Memorial Day weekend and ends September 30, featuring the Some Like It Hot – Overnight Package that starts at $279 per room, per night and includes accommodations, along with a pitcher of poolside mojitos and a kukui coconut spa kit. Guests can work up a sweat through unlimited fitness classes and then cool off in the hotel’s 300-foot infinity pool where DJs, small-batch artisan sodas and boozy slushes can be found. Visit www.viceroyhotelsandresorts.com . The package is subject to availability. 
· Naples Beach Hotel & Golf Club, Southwest Florida -- This resort is offering the third night free from May 21 to Sept. 30, based on availability, with holiday weekends excluded. For holiday weekends (Memorial Day, Fourth of July, and Labor Day), the resort is offering the fourth night free instead. Visit www.NaplesBeachHotel.com , specifically http://tinyurl.com/pv8p7dy . Blackout dates may apply, and the promotion may not be combined with any other offer. Also, the promotion is not applicable to groups. 
· The Gates Hotel, Key West – One of the Last Key’s newest hotels, The Gates, invites Florida residents to be among the first to experience Hemingway's "old school Key West" with a Florida Resident rate. Floridians can unlock the Keys and book their stay at the 245-room property for 15 percent off, valid now to Dec. 31, with rates starting at $199 per night. Book online with code: http://bit.ly/1DdvoQi . 
· LaPlaya Beach & Golf Resort, Naples — This resort is offering a Florida Resident rate starting at $199 per night, bookable now through Sept. 30, for stays June 1 - Sept. 30, when using promo code: FLRES. Visit www.laplayaresort.com .
